testsuite.name: com.superorganizer.repository.TaskRepositoryTest

testcase.name: findByDeadlineBetween should return tasks within deadline range()
findByDateBetween should return tasks within date range()
findByDeadlineIsNotNull should return tasks with deadline()
findByOrderByDateDesc should return tasks ordered by date descending()
findByDeadlineIsNull should return tasks without deadline()
findTasksByFilters should return all tasks when no filters provided()
findByOrderByDeadlineAsc should return tasks ordered by deadline()
findByPriority should return tasks with matching priority()
findByTaskType should return tasks with matching type()
findByOrderByPriorityAsc should return tasks ordered by priority()
findTasksByFilters should return tasks matching all filters()
